name: 蕭俊祥
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 數位影像基礎，2. 空間域影像強化，3. 頻域影像強化，4. 影像還原，5 彩色影像處理，6 形態學影像處理，7. 影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9. 機器視覺系統。
1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.
schedule:
Week 1:  Introduction to Python
Week 2:  Introduction to OpenCV
Week 3-5:  Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 
Week 6-8: Image restoration,
Week 9: Midterm Exam 
Week10-11: Color image processing, 
Week12:14: Morphological image processing 
Week15: Exam 2
Week16: Image segmentation
Week17: Machine vision system.
Week18: Final Exam
scorePolicy: Midterm exam 30%, Exam 2 20%,  Final Exam 30%, HW 20%
materials:
1 Digital Image Processing (English) 4th 版本
   作者 Rafael Gonzalez, Richard Woods
2 自編講義
